title: @Morello why are you avoiding talking about Darius?
body:
Why is it that you won't say anything about Darius? Is it because you don't have anything to say and he's shelved off for the 2013 fighter rework(oops)?

Darius players want to know he's getting SOMETHING soon, not another talk about in Jan, talk again in Jan, forget for another year or 2, talk again, rinse and repeat.

replies.body: Don't worry, Yasuo and Kalista are gonna be in line right behind him. HIstory repeats itself, especially with the designer of these champs.....
